evidence.source_document: Memorandum of Points and Authorities in Support of Defendants' Motion to Dismiss Plaintiffs' Unreasonable Delay Claims
evidence.text: The word 'monitor' appeared once in the Memorandum of Points and Authorities (tokens 0-16039), but only in the context of 'monitoring grant applications' (e.g., 'monitor the grant applications' in the motion), not as a person's name. No document mentions a court-appointed or agreed-upon monitor.
